cause.description:
Wombats are ugly. Very ugly. In fact, so ugly most people don't even want to look at them. Thousands of people ignore the existence of wombats and it needs to stop. People need to see the beauty of seeing wombats for what they are- and will respect their need to make holes.
1. Wombats need to be loved
2. Wombats should not be ignored
3. Wombats should not be laughed at
cause.name: Love a Wombat
